title: Spider-Man: Death of the Stacys
description: Spider-Man's career has often been shaped by tragedy, but rarely as much as in the story of the Stacy's. Two of Spider-Man's greatest enemies, Doc Ock and the Green Goblin, made comic-book history by killing the wall-crawler's police officer mentor, Captain Stacy, and his first true love, Gwen.
author: Stan Lee
